department.dept_long_name: Department of Chemistry and Chemical Biology

course.title: Advanced Organic Synthesis and Reactions
course.description: This course presents reactivity principles of organic molecules. Topics include frontier molecular orbital theory, stereoelectronic effects, conformational analysis, cationic, anionic, radical, and carbene intermediates. These reactivity principles are used in a presentation of target-oriented synthesis. Strategies and tactics for assembling complex organic molecules are presented.
course.prerequisites: Undergraduates must take Chemistry 30 as a prerequisite.
